snippet: Republicans who rail against spending ignore the waste and expense of closing government.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Republicans for shutting down government and not telling Americans the truth about real costs to taxpayers; cites estimates that find shutdown will cost the country $300 million a day in lost economic output; holds Republicans claim Affordable Care Act is hurting the economy while they ignore actual damage their single-minded crusade against it has done to the country.
lead_paragraph: Republicans who rail against spending ignore the waste and expense of closing government.
